title: Awaken the Passion
description: A young princess raised in seclusion. A seductive angel with a secret agenda. The world before the Great Floodâ€”a world speeding rapidly towards its own destruction...unless one family rises up and confronts a devastating enemy. Now, as worlds collide and the forces of good and evil meet in a final epic battle, two people will discover just how far they will go for true love.
author: Summer Lee
